name: iDPRT Label Maker, Thermal Barcode Printer with No Bound Consumables, Bluetooth & USB Connection, 140pcs/min Speed, Customizable App, Supports Various Sized 1"-3.15", Label Printer for Small Business
about_this_item: [300% Cost-Saving Freedom: No Bound Consumables] Experience the cost-saving freedom of our label maker, which eliminates the need for bound consumables. This label maker allows you to use printer paper from any brand available on the website (for thermal paper of suitable size only). Say goodbye to expensive proprietary label paper and embrace the flexibility of choosing affordable options. With this label maker, you can save up to 300% compared to others.

[Two Connection Options & Seamless Connectivity] Experience unparalleled convenience with our barcode printer's versatile connectivity options. Seamlessly connect via Bluetooth or USB and unleash the power of printing from any device. Effortlessly print directly from your phone using our intuitive app, designed for easy operation and maximum flexibility. Whether you're on the go or at your desk, our barcode printer enables you to complete your personal tasks with ease and efficiency.

[Unmatched Speed & Efficiency] Experience unparalleled speed and efficiency with our address label printer, surpassing competitors in the race for fast label printing. With a fast printing speed of 140pcs/min, our address label printer excels in handling large-scale printing tasks with ease. Whether you're printing a batch of address labels or embarking on a mass labeling project, our address label printer delivers unmatched performance, ensuring you achieve your goals quickly and effortlessly.

[Versatile Labeling] From address labels to barcodes, this barcode label printer supports various sized labels, enabling you to label file folders, storage boxes, and more. Provide a polished look to your packages with address labels, streamline your inventory management with barcode labels, or add a personal touch to gift tags and party favors. Whether you're in the workplace or home, our barcode label maker ensures professional labeling in every scenario.

[Customizable Labels] Unleash your creativity and make your labels unique with our label printer for small business's complimentary editing tools("Herelabel" for macOS and Android, and "Label Designer" for PC). Customize your labels with different fonts, graphics, and layouts, all tailored to your preferences. Whether you're adding a personal touch or aligning with your brand, you can use our label printer for small business to print customized labels to stand out from the crowd and leave a lasting impression.

[Perfect Gifts & Customer Service] The perfect gifts for Christmas' Day, New Year, Birthdays, Father's Day and more. Shop with confidence as we have excellent customer service team for you. Please feel free to contact us via Amazon if you have any problems before and after sales. We are ready to serve you at any time.

title: Label Genius
content: This Bluetooth thermal label printer has been a game-changer in my home office, offering seamless connectivity and the ability to print various sized labels with ease; it's compact yet powerful, fitting perfectly on my desk without taking up much space. The setup was straightforward, and I was printing labels from my smartphone in minutes. What I appreciate most is its versatility – whether I need small address labels or large shipping labels, the quality and clarity are consistently excellent, saving me time and ensuring my packages look professional every time. The thermal printing means no more messy ink cartridges, making it an eco-friendly choice too.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024

title: Great printer once you get it set up
content: Reviewing iDPRT Label Maker - 3 inch I have a few thermal printers, for different purposes. One thing the others don’t do is print barcode sized labels. That’s the purpose of this printer, for me. I need to print barcodes for inventory labels. The printer is perfectly suited to this purpose. It prints fast, has adequate quality and is easy to use once it’s set up.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2024

title: Versatile and Easy to Use!
content: The printer is a bit of a paradox though. I got it to work on my Windows PC with no issues, and was able to download the software for it also, however, that’s because I’m in the tech industry. The instructions are not helpful and this is not suitable for someone who doesn’t have tech skills.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024

title: Fast printer, but font can't be small
content: I need a versatile yet simple-to-use receipt printer for my business. This model from iDPRT is perfect as it works for me now, and is scaleable enough to expand as my business grows. It can connect to either WINDOWS, MAC, or LINUX systems, and has dual output capabilities with both USB and LAN cabling. While Bluetooth is easy and convenient, it lacks the security and reliability that cabling devices bring.

title: an easy to use small printer, makes clear labels
content: The printer comes with everything you need except the labels it comes with 1"x3" is a VERY small roll.  Next it comes with a CD, but majority of the PCs now do not have CDrom drives, but you can go to their website and download all the software.  The two you need is the driver (if using a PC) and the "Label Designer".  The printer was easy to setup and the software is very easy to use.  I tested both PC and Bluetooth.  Printing from my iPhone seemed to produce clearer prints.  Small fonts weren't that clear, but it seems to work fine with generic thermal labels!  Decent FAST thermal printer
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024

title: Very Efficient Organization.
content: This is a standout choice in terms of label makers. One of the most significant advantages of this label maker is its ability to use thermal paper from any brand, which is a huge cost-saver. I cannot overstate the convenience and cost effectiveness of this feature alone! Also, the dual connection options, including Bluetooth and USB, provide flexibility to print from virtually any device. I can use my smartphone or my office printer, and setting it up is straightforward and hassle-free no matter where I am. The intuitive app enhances this process, making it quick and easy to print labels. The ability to support various label sizes adds to its versatility. I’ve used it for everything from labeling file folders and storage boxes to creating custom barcodes for my small business backstock inventory. It's been a great help, highly recommend!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2024

title: Nice printer
content: I have a coupe printers that are similar to this. From them, this one actually comes out on top. The fact that it takes most any thermal paper out there is awesome. Hooks up and installs very easily, you don’t have to do much. Just install the app on your phone or pad and away you go. It’s also fast, that 140pcs a min is insane when you look at it. It takes on any label job i throw at it. Highly recommended
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2024

title: Very neat, solid printer for labels
content: This is a very solid, well made printer, it's a bit bigger than many thermal printer models so you'll need to make more desk space. But you can tell it's a hefty frame that will last a lot of work. It came with a CD, so you don't need to download a driver online, though the instructions did say where you can if you want to. Once the software was setup, this began to print very cleanly and quickly. You can even adjust the printing speeds, though it's pretty fast that I don't know if you'd need it faster. Maybe for very big businesses. This should have no problem keeping up with those, and for small businesses, more than sufficient. It came with a roll of labels so you can test it out, but as it's a small sample, you'll need to have your own on hand. Luckily I did, and was pleased to be able to use them finally. The print quality is good, and you'll have professional looking labels.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2024

title: Perfect label maker for small businesses and personal use!!
content: I wanted a small label maker for my business but didn't want to spend a ton of money nor get something that was to large for my home office. This label maker was the perfect find for me!! It is compact, easy to use, sets up simply and fits on my computer stand to stay out of the way until I need it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2024

title: Very fast
content: It took me a minute to get this set up on my Mac.  What I learned is that even though it automatically detects the lights will flash when sending. a print job with the detected driver, nothing will come out.  This was very confusing because everyone on the Mac side looked fine.  After installing the driver and then adding the printer again using the new print driver I was able to print immediately.  The printing was incredibly fast ass it spits out my small labels in less than a second.  The paper loading and aligning was very straightforward, but I ran into an issue with how the printer detected my label position.  It would print off-center every time, and there was no way to calibrate the starting point.  I was able to make a template to adjust for the offset, but I wish I could specify this somewhere else.  Other than this issue, the printer is very nice.  I used the USB cable, which was USB 2.0 A to B.  The included USB-C adapter is a nice addition.  Overall, a very nice a quick printer with good print quality.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2024

title: Nice Little Printer
content: I bought this so I could have a nice thermal printer for my packages when I am on the road. This unit is well made and prints perfectly.

title: printing is fast,  quality is great.
content: I work from my phone, a lot. I like that this thermal printer can work from an app. I am not the most tech savvy person in the world, but I’m not a novice either. I always have difficulty getting the labels to do what I want, and I end up wasting so much time. I mostly need to print sequential barcodes for my products, but it’s so hard to make that happen on other thermal, or regular label printers. It took me less than 5 minutes on this one and I was in business. They have a lot of templates already made for you based on what you want to do, you just edit it to your specifications and off you go. I was really happy with how easy the app was to use. Also, there were no crazy data collections when using the app, making it more secure. I call that a big win!
